name: DownThemAll - Remove 3.x GUI Clutter
description: DownThemAll 3.x switched to a more distracting "Donate!" button and added an actions sidebar which duplicates the actions already offered in the context menu. Remove them to go back to the simple elegance of the 2.x UI.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.

additional_info: If you use this style, please do consider donating to DownThemAll. As much as I can't stand having the new donation button jump out in the corner of my eye, DTA is still one of my favourite time-saving tools.
